page.title: 02SUBURBAN BLACKPOOL cont'd.
page.content:
hypermarket and several nationally known furniture,carpet and D-I-Y outlets.
This region of Blackpool is the one that is at present undergoing considerable changes with infill building and the development of former semi-agricultural land.It is the part of the famous seaside resort that is rarely seen by the visitor although the{new link road to the M55}will carry visitors high above the district along an embanked carriageway enroute into the town centre.
The new link road will also provide many of the present and developing industrial and commercial organisations with easier access to their suppliers and customers via the M55/M6 Motorways.
